subject: Re: The Anual Stanley party.
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  Every year I guess, there a 
conference/gathering/investigation/party at the Stanley Motel here. 
More box user/makers are going this year. These investigators are 
such paranormal experts that they consitently ignore what the 
inventor of the box says. I made the damn thing, it works, I 
obvioulsy know how it works and how to make it, yet they ignore what 
I say. That's this weekend, BTW. 
>  
>  If the boxes, both mine and ones made by others worked for these 
people you'd see the voices posted everywhere on the web, instead the 
you get "oh, we had to send that off to be anayzed", what a crock! 
All these people are doing is trying to jump on Moon's bandwagon. 
>  
>  Perhaps Moon's statement on his site that I don't with any groups 
was pre-cognitive. I think that's a good idea. These 
groups/investigators tend to have preconcieved ideas about what the 
evidence consists of, and ignore anything that doesn't fit into that. 
Yeah, that's scientific all to hell.
>  
>  Frank-S
>  
>  
> _________________________________________________________________
> Climb to the top of the charts! Play Star Shuffle: the word 
scramble challenge with star power.

icid=starshuffle_wlmailtextlink_oct

 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
   Hi Frank & All, Perhaphs these Paranormal Investigators (some with 
many books they've written, too) are the wrong types of -"Experts"- 
people to have or use the boxes (for their own benifits, too)? It 
seems someone who'd be dedicated in doing their own "independant" 
Research then writting about it or doing Low-Cost demos. of the box 
(now & then) would be a better way to go with these boxes  . . . and 
of course the 1st thing to mention is WHO the maker IS; Mr. Frank 
Sumption!!!  My 2c worth, here!     =Judy=  P.S. I look at what other 
Pioneers have done with EVP's & ITC's!!!
